data.text: @dailycamera Hard Pass. 'Passive' tolerance refers to the vast majority of citizens tolerating state-sponsored policies, or as Marcuse described it, the 'toleration of entrenched and established attitudes even if their damaging effect on man and nature is evident'
@dailycamera Lull? So youll be enacting mandates whenever? Of course, don’t lose the power to shut down the state any time you’d like..
